free_courses.title: Python for Everybody
free_courses.description: This course teaches Python programming from basics to advanced concepts, including data structures, databases, and SQL. It focuses on practical applications for data analysis.
free_courses.why_efficient: Efficiently covers Python and SQL fundamentals essential for data analysis tasks.

free_courses.title: Data Science Math Skills
free_courses.description: This course covers the essential mathematical foundations for data science, including probability, linear algebra, and calculus. It emphasizes applying these concepts to real-world data analysis problems.
free_courses.why_efficient: Covers statistical concepts crucial for data analysis tasks.

free_courses.title: Data Visualization with Python
free_courses.description: This course focuses on creating effective data visualizations using Python libraries like Matplotlib and Seaborn. It also includes hands-on exercises for working with Pandas data structures.
free_courses.why_efficient: Combines data visualization techniques with practical Pandas skills for analyzing and visualizing data.

Python: Data Analysis with Pandas and Python
Data Analysis: Data Analysis with Pandas and Python
Pandas: Data Analysis with Pandas and Python
NumPy: Data Analysis with Pandas and Python
